titleStmt.title: The true settlement of a Christians faith,bafter shaking assaults, by its own evidence; and by the internal sealing work of the spirit; pointed at, in some special inquiries thereon in a letter to a friend. With some serious reflections on the present times we are in, and those great vicissitudes of providence, wihch have been in the publick state of Britain in this last age, in a II. letter. By a minister of the Ghospel [sic].
titleStmt.author: Fleming, Robert, 1630-1694.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Dr. Williams' Library, London.
A minister of the Gospel = Robert Fleming, the elder.
